oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of actors to perform in a local play, a family portrait showing five generations, interior and exterior views of an airplane, boy scouts paying tribute to Revolutionary War soldiers, and two ads. Nashville Tennessean, 1931 March 1.

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of actors to perform at the Little Theater in Nashville, a local family portrait showing five generations, interior and exterior views of an airplane, boy scouts paying tribute to Revolutionary War soldiers in Louiseville, Kentucky, and two ads. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
